content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I have not received any new commands or developments to report. Nothing new happened.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'encoding'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "unzip -l best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Archive:  best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip\\n  Length      Date    Time    Name\\n---------  ---------- -----   ----\\n        0  2023-05-18 21:28   best_ways_to_learn_abroad/\\n      337  2023-05-18 21:26   best_ways_to_learn_abroad/best_ways_to_learn_abroad.txt\\n---------                     -------\\n      337                     2 files\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}]
